pkgmetadata.longdescription: Biological Sequences Retrieval and Analysis // Exploratory data analysis and data visualization for biological sequence (DNA and protein) data. Seqinr includes utilities for sequence data management under the ACNUC system described in Gouy, M. et al. (1984) Nucleic Acids Res. 12:121-127 doi:10.1093/nar/12.1Part1.121.
